extendedInfo.description: GO SMS Pro Widget enables you to view messages on desktop. You can use this widget independently without GO SMS. But, to enjoy more powerful SMS funtion, you need to install the latest version of GO SMS Pro, which is the most popular SMS/MMS app in Android Market.** How to add GO SMS Widget on your home screen?- Long press on your home screen, press the Widget option and choose GO SMS widget. Make sure your home screen has enough room for the widget.Available Size:-icon-4x2Actions:- View- Reply- Write new message- Call- Delete- Mark as read- Widget settings, includes changing style**Note**Some funtions need you to bind to v3.59 or the newest version of GO SMS Pro, if your haven't installed or the version is too old, we suggest you to dowload or update your GO SMS Pro main program.** Related website **- Download the newest GO SMS Pro: 1.Search âGO SMS Proâ in google market; 2.https://market.android.com/details?id=com.jb.gosms- Visit our Blog: http://gosms.goforandroid.com- Visit our official website: http://www.goforandroid.com- Email to us: gomessanger@gmail.com- Visit our facebook profile: http://www.facebook.com/apps/application.php?id=178919808825035Thank you for your support very much.

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: It\'s cool bro.it great widget
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix it!!!
reviews.comment: I like this app... but I think that u should do an update where the widget can change appearance also... Not just black & white, but different colors
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect for the program...but
reviews.comment: I don\'t use the full program. This widget pulls the texts as a priority, and Makes FB chat heads not work. They need to make it less of a priority I suppose. Would be a nice option
reviews.author: Hezekiah Domowski

reviews.title: I have an htc one
reviews.comment: This was the best texting app. But since I switched to a htc phone there\'s been issue. Plz fit
reviews.author: Galvan Arturo

reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!
reviews.comment: I love this app it works best with the go SMS app and its so easy. And quick !  :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why?
reviews.comment: Why after the last GoSms update, can\'t I use my GoSms widget without installing the Go Home Launcher? I don\'t want a Go home Launcher. It worked great before, loved the envelope icon. Now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DIY themes
reviews.comment: i luv designing my themes..tho I\'ve uploaded 3 and still no show in the shop..no responses to my emails about it either..how long does it take to upload my themes..and a reply would be nice..so slack
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: one star
reviews.comment: no update for two years. remove this from g.play or update to fix bugs. delivery reports doesnt work and large msgs cannot send. when i send a msg including more than 153 letters, it breaks in to parts and send.
reviews.author: Haritha Tharanga

reviews.title: Hmmm
reviews.comment: Please make some update for this widget. I like this widget. But why no update like since 2011?? Thats sound old. It will be more awesome if you make some update. Thank u.
reviews.author: Jacxie Carmelia

reviews.title: Megan
reviews.comment: I love love love love love this widget!!! It is great fir messaging and doesnt mess the one that is programed into your phone! Great widget!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more htc compatibility.
reviews.comment: I want it to show the contact\'s picture from my adress book rather than from just the \"phone\" section. Htc incredible 2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Same thing as GO! SMS WIDGET. No need for this
reviews.comment: Needs ability to reply in widget. Would also be nice to have theme settings, as GO SMS has for their popup. Other than that, it is very basic and useful. Resizing is helpful!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just love it!!!
reviews.comment: I had this app  for over a year now and use nothing else my default text app  is the thing of the past. This widget is the only thing I use.  It\'s a must for texters like me. Cause you don\'t have to pull up the app all the time just text from your home screen. There are no problems and I can\'t live without it.  I just love love love this app!!  Great job go.
reviews.author: Sinister Grin

reviews.comment: Thank u for making go sms sd enabled. I\'d prefer if the GoWidgets were sd enabled as well, but i dont need a widget!! Great job none the less!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Best messaging widget and service out there. I cant stress how many widget and messaging apps ive tried over the past year. Lets just say ALOT. I love how easy it is to customize the keyboard and app in general.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: sms pro
reviews.comment: really have fun using this app, aside from so many free themes, i can personalise my messages, thanks to this apps
reviews.author: Eric Evangelista

reviews.title: Skins won\'t install
reviews.comment: I would have given it five stars but the skins won\'t apply to it. good other than that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: :-( Isn\'t working!
reviews.comment: This isn\'t working for me.. It doesn\'t show up :-( But, if it had worked - good job! I love GO launcher Ex, GO sms PRO, and everything from that developer. Samsung Galaxy Ace
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s Awesome, however....
reviews.comment: It\'s Awesome, however does not hide the encrypted messages.  There is an option to encrypt and password protect SMS Threads; These should not show up under the widget or should show up with just blank message area just like it happens in SMS Pop-up.  Hope we will have our LuvLy Go Team consider this one.  They are the who has redefined the Android.  Regars Syed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: T9!
reviews.comment: Would be nice if the widget actually implimented to the T9 instead of just showing it. This widget would also be much better if it was like the widget used with the Go Launcher.
reviews.author: A Google User
